articles.author: Juli Clover
articles.title: Spotify, Epic Games, and Others Argue Apple's App Store Changes Do Not Comply With DMA - MacRumors
articles.description: Spotify, Epic Games, Deezer, Paddle, and several other developers and EU associations today sent a joint letter to the European Commission to...
articles.content: "Core Technology" There it is. Put up or shut up. Either STOP USING Apple's developers' work, or PAY FOR IT. ?iOS dev here who literally could never make a penny without standing on the shoulders of … [+1615 chars]
